newsitem.title: USA: Food Lion year-to-date sales up 12 pct.
newsitem.headline: Food Lion year-to-date sales up 12 pct.

text.p: Food Lion Inc said its year-to-date sales as of May 3 were $3.4 billion, up 12 percent from the year-ago level.
It said same store sales continue to be "flat" as compared to the prior year, but did not provide figures.
The supermarkets operator said its same-store sales trend reflects a lack of food price inflation and the soft sales that has been generally affecting the supermarket industry.
In 1996, Food Lion posted sales of $9.0 billion. The chain operates more than 1,100 stores in 14 states and 92 Kash n' Karry stores in West Central Florida.
